title: LLM Request Event
description: Schema for a request sent to the Quantum Consciousness Core for LLM processing.

request_id.description: A unique identifier for this specific request, used for tracing.

model.description: The specific model identifier requested for processing.

messages.description: A list of messages forming the conversation history.

max_tokens.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate in the completion.

temperature.description: Controls randomness: lower is more deterministic.
